EmailTemplate.name: 202002_Global_C&PS_Q2-Price-Change_Email_Operational.20200228_Q2PriceChangeEmail
EmailTemplate.subject: Catalog Pricing Updates Coming April 1, 2020
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Honeywell will update the Commercial Spares, Commercial Universal Flat Rate (UFR), D&S Universal Flat Rate and SPEX 2020 catalog pricing on select parts effective April 1, 2020. To view the published part numbers impacted by this pricing update, access the Honeywell Aerospace downloadable catalogs <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/pricing-catalogs]]> and filter on the column called ‘Revised Price Effective Date’.
For your planning:
- After March 1, 2020: Access and view the updated 2020 pricing on Honeywell Aerospace for downloadable 2020 Spares, UFR and SPEX catalog files.
To prevent order disruptions:
- Effective October 1, 2019: Our updated 2020 prices will be incorporated in the Honeywell Aerospace online ordering and EDI interfaces. Please review the updated pricing and apply it to all new purchase orders created on or after April 1, 2020. In addition, please update your pricing system with the revised pricing information.
The Honeywell Aerospace Portal <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/o02tZ008N00lEQ0hzXIGrq0]]> is always available for your order management needs, including parts quoting, ordering, and tracking. View Honeywell Aerospace updates and tutorials here <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/I0l0uQz0qhE9ZG2r0N0IX00]]>.
If you have any questions, please contact your Honeywell business focal.
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace
